greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If y is the integer partition with Heinz number n, then a(n) = |y|! / syt(y), where syt(y) is the number of standard Young tableaux of shape y.
comment: a(n) is the LCM of the denominators of the coefficients in the expansion of Schur functions in terms of power sum symmetric functions.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 21 2018
